replies.msg:
That Kimi Raikkonen pre-stop message for you, with full-on sass! He was on the team radio, saying he wanted to be "aggressive" with Max Verstappen.

His race engineeer said: "We are trying but the 10 second penalty is an issue.

Raikkonen snapped: "Yeah but it isn't going to even be a point if we don't clear. I'm not allowed to think any more..."

Raikkonen now back up to ninth, having overtaken Kevin Magnussen and Carlos Sainz...
